sorular.soru: What is the speed limit here?

feedback.metin: A speed limit of 100 km/h applies to autowegen outside built-up areas. On other roads outside built-up areas, the speed limit is 80 km/h. A speed limit of 50 km/h applies to autowegen within built-up areas, unless otherwise indicated by signs. A green line in the middle indicates an autoweg.

sorular.soru: What is the maximum allowed length of a passenger car including trailer?

feedback.metin: A combination of a passenger vehicle and a trailer may not exceed 18 metres in length.

sorular.soru: Within what distance of an intersection is parking prohibited?

feedback.metin: Parking a vehicle within 5 metres of an intersection is prohibited. Additionally, passenger cars may not wait in the intersection area. Picking up or dropping off passengers is therefore also forbidden.
